overview:
Our experiences throughout life define who we are.

Experous provides hi-technology products and services for CHE (Computing for Human Experience) which is what we believe to be the natural successor to the “Social Networking” era.

There still exists a very large gap in many aspects of our daily need for information consumption and contribution and the technology available to fill these needs at present day.

Social networking embraced the field of “Social Science” and was the latest “step” closer to a seamless bridge between human beings and their predisposition for sharing and seeking new information.

Human Experience computing & networking embraces the combined field of “Cognitive Neuroscience” and is the “next big step” in this rapid global and cultural movement.

Our technology not only embraces the above field of science but integrates with other existing sciences and technologies to provide a centralized, unique, highly effective and efficient first ever “Experience Platform”.
